page.title: 16LOCAL HISTORY
page.content:
{NEOLITHIC CAVE. Neolithic man lived in this cave thousands of years ago,perhaps its hard to believe but it is true.
The cave,which is in the grounds of Tollard Residential Home, is not very big. It used to be a lot bigger but over thousands of years soil and leaves have covered it up and now it is only two metres high.If a team of archaeologists excavated it they would probably find fossils,primitive tools and lots of shells because although the cave is set quite far back in the country side thousands of years ago the sea would be just in front of the cave and therefore the Neolithic man would have lived off the sea and shore. { {Neolithic cave (cont) page 17.
